methods.name: a
javadoc: Called when the player finishes using this Item (E.g. finishes eating.). Not called when the player stops using the Item before the action is complete.

methods.name: a
javadoc: Called to trigger the item's "innate" right click behavior. To handle when this item is used on a Block, see {@link #onItemUse}.

methods.name: d_
javadoc: returns the action that specifies what animation to play when the items is being used

methods.name: e_
javadoc: How long it takes to use or consume an item
